item.name: DataSet1
item.query: SELECT ALLOWED CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.LineNumber, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.Recorder, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.SecondPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.MinutePeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.HourPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.DayPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.WeekPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.TenDaysPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.MonthPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.QuarterPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.HalfYearPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.YearPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.Company, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.PlanningPeriod, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.GLAccount, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.Currency, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.Item, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.AmountReceiptTurnover, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.AmountReceiptCurTurnover, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.AmountExpenseTurnover, CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers.AmountExpenseCurTurnover FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssetsForecast.Turnovers(, , Auto, PlanningPeriod = &PlanningPeriod OR &PlanningPeriod = VALUE(Catalog.PlanningPeriods.EmptyRef)) AS CashFlowStatementBudgetTurnovers

item.name: DataSet3
item.query:
SELECT ALLOWED CASE WHEN CashAssets.Recorder = UNDEFINED THEN NULL ELSE CashAssets.Recorder END AS Recorder, CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.CashAssetsType, CashAssets.BankAccountPettyCash, CashAssets.Currency, CashAssets.Item, CashAssets.AmountCur AS AmountCurReceiptFact, CashAssets.Amount AS AmountReceiptFact, NULL AS AmountCurExpenseFact, NULL AS AmountExpenseFact, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, Day) AS DayPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, WEEK) AS WeekPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, TENDAYS) AS TenDaysPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, MONTH) AS MonthPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, QUARTER) AS QuarterPeriod, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, YEAR) AS YearPeriod FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets AS CashAssets WHERE CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Receipt) AND CashAssets.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod
UNION ALL
SELECT CashAssets.Recorder, CashAssets.Company, CashAssets.CashAssetsType, CashAssets.BankAccountPettyCash, CashAssets.Currency, CashAssets.Item, NULL, NULL, CashAssets.AmountCur, CashAssets.Amount, BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, Day), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, WEEK), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, TENDAYS), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, MONTH), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, QUARTER), BEGINOFPERIOD(CashAssets.Period, YEAR) FROM AccumulationRegister.CashAssets AS CashAssets WHERE CashAssets.RecordType = VALUE(AccumulationRecordType.Expense) AND CashAssets.Period between &BeginOfPeriod AND &EndOfPeriod

totalField.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(AmountReceiptTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountReceiptTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL(SUM(AmountReceiptFact), 0) - SUM(AmountReceiptTurnover)) * 100 / SUM(AmountReceiptTurnover) END

CASE WHEN SUM(AmountExpensesTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountExpensesTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL(SUM(AmountExpenseFact), 0) - SUM(AmountExpensesTurnover)) * 100 / SUM(AmountExpensesTurnover) END

CASE WHEN SUM(AmountReceiptCurTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountReceiptCurTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL (SUM(AmountCurReceiptFact), 0) - SUM(AmountReceiptCurTurnover)) * 100 / SUM(AmountReceiptCurTurnover) END

CASE WHEN SUM(AmountExpenseCurTurnover) IS NULL OR SUM(AmountExpenseCurTurnover) = 0 THEN "-" ELSE (ISNULL(SUM(AmountCurExpenseFact), 0) - SUM(AmountExpenseCurTurnover)) * 100 / SUM(AmountExpenseCurTurnover) END
